lender.name: Solomon Onyango
lender.loan_because: I do believe it is important to disclose that I was once employed and my terms were void of any pension able benefit. At the time of my employment, I had a very cordial relationship with my bankers but when I did present this current proposal, they declined as my account was not performing consistently as before and to make it worse they kindly requested a tangible security to accompany it. sincerely,
lender.occupational_info:
Hi, My name is Solomon Onyango. I am a Kenyan citizen working for an electronic money transfer company. This is a service accorded by a local mobile service company to serve its clientele by enabling them to remit money to friends and relatives through text instructions. This is made possible through the company's appointed agents all over the country who receive and pay funds on demand. As an administrator of a local agent in my locality called KATITO, it has come to my realization that it’s strenuous for an agent to provide money services cum top-up call cards hence my interest to supply the locals with top up cards. I have two boys who are through with schooling and would like to engage them in distribution of these top-up cards by way of bicycles which is the local mode of transport. The area to be covered is on a 20 km radius and encompasses the environ of people settled around the lake. The essence is that local fishermen log on the internet to check the prevailing market prices as to keep abreast with knowledge of bargaining so as not to be exploited by the middlemen roaming the beaches.
The bone of contention is affordability of these top up cards! Mobile service providers have various denominations at the disposal of their subscribers and the affordable, cheapest denomination comes in kshs 50 and kshs 20. By conversion, 1 dollar equals kshs 65 at current going rate. Internet connectivity provided by the mobile operators is affordable and a credit top up of kshs 20 can accord one 20 minutes of browsing.
My main focus is to set up a supply chain to the locals of top-up cards of denominations of 50 and 20 with a daily supply of 3500 cards reaching all. This will be in breakdowns of 1000 cards in 50 denominator and 2500 cards in 20 denominators.
The 3500 purchase is meant to reach 48 outlets everyday by quick access with bicycles. It is important to note that the main economic activities comprise fishing at the Lake Victoria , cattle trade, cross border complimentary business and peasant subsistence farming.
To factor on viability of my project, I would tabulate as follows: Card of kshs 50 = 2.50 commission Card of kshs 20 = 1.00 commission Hence; 1000 cards of kshs 50 = 100 * 2.50 = 2500 2500 cards of kshs 20 = 2000 * 1 = 2000 Total = 4500
I hereby do approach KIVA as an organization to solicit for me 2000 dollars to help me start up this noble idea in conjunction with my jobless sons I was introduced to yourselves by Mr. Martin Opondo who is a community worker with AMREF KENYA (REF: opondoobwar@gmail.com)

lender.name: Largo
lender.loan_because: People need to be the change they want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I go where life takes me and do what I can to finance it.

lender.name: hila
lender.loan_because: I believe that a small help can make a big change if we all join

lender.name: Mandy
lender.whereabouts: Cape Town Western Cape, South Africa

lender.name: Sharon

lender.occupational_info: I perform regularity and performance audits on local government structures

lender.name: MAGDI
lender.loan_because:
Hi
My name is Magdi Bunt and I am living in South Africa. I have been working as an instructor and an educator for the past 8 years. I am currently tutoring kids in my small place and making them more able to learn. In Africa education is quite a problem and I am teaching people to read and write properly. I am a dedicated and this is what I would like to do in my life. I would like to open and rent out a larger premises where I can have the opportunity to teach and tutor more kids and people at the same time. At the moment I do not have enough funds to rent out a larger space and I would like to loan money for this. Currently I am tutoring from home where I can fit 4 people in my very small dining area. I am 30 years old, happily married. And I have helped hundreds of kids and youth as well parents to be literate and have given them an opportunity to live a better life by teaching them how to read and write as well as raising their study abilities. I love what I am doing but I can’t manage to rent an office from my pay. I saw this wonderful opportunity on the Oprah show and I would like make use of this opportunity because it will give me a good start to build up my “Dream” tutoring and education centre here in this province or area. I love to help people and I have dedicated my life to do this. However I would like to take my small tutoring school to a higher level where more youth will have the opportunity to get educated and find jobs. Please put me on your pages for loans.
Best Regards, Magdi Bunt
lender.occupational_info: I am Instructing children and youth with learning difficulties and make them more able and raise their study abilities.

lender.name: Chamsi for Quote Couture
lender.loan_because:
We feel very strongly about empowering people in Africa because it is the continent that needs it the most, and believe peer-to-peer microloans are the best and most sustainable way to end poverty in the world.
In more precise terms, there are multiple positive impacts to having more entrepreneurs in the world: - An entrepreneur creates at least one job (for him/herself) - Instead of drawing more resources from an already burdened country, the entrepreneur is paying taxes to the country, and therefore helping improve the infrastructure of the country. This is, unfortunately, not as applicable when the government is corrupt, of course, but as the people develop more economic power (through more entrepreneurs), their government will cater more to them, rather than catering to the IMF, the World Bank, and others whose conditions to help are sometimes questionable). - An entrepreneur creates more work for others: for suppliers, and potentially other employees. - An entrepreneur can pass on his/her knowledge to others, and therefore create other entrepreneurs
And last but not least, on the individual level, being an entrepreneur means being free to live life on your own terms and being the master of your destiny!
lender.occupational_info:
We are entrepreneurs too. We enjoy inspiring people so we created Quote Couture where we cherry pick amazing quotes that people resonate with and design them on shirts. When you wear the shirt around town, you not only feel good wearing it but you could inspire a bunch more people. It’s a chain reaction of positive energy! ☺ We also enjoy empowering people so we use a part of the profits to make loans through Kiva Team Africa, and welcome you to join us!
We also have a design agency, Splenium Design, that creates high-end design for businesses that have a great product or service to contribute to the world. More specifically, we create high-end user experiences & interfaces (web application, iPhone applications, etc.), and branding (logo, business cards, other identity pieces, website, brochure, iPhone microsites, etc.).
We love what we do and we hope you do too!
We started Team Africa on Kiva. Join us: http://www.kiva.org/team/africa

lender.occupational_info: We have an internet business selling homeschool books and Bibles and CD's and church supplies.

lender.name: julianna
lender.loan_because: I care and want to see people inspired and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Visual Art Instructor

lender.name: Allyson
lender.loan_because: I believe that supporting others offers the greatest reward.

lender.name: Newbigging Primary School
lender.loan_because: we won't to help people and give them the chance to have a helathy and enjoyable life!

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to have everything I could ever need and I want other children to have all the resources for success that I have! By helping mommies and daddies earn money for their families, I can help to make this happen.
lender.occupational_info: I play a lot with my friends at pre-school. I have a lot to say these days, but adults don't always understand me; I keep trying to communicate with them. I love my older sister, Emma. She makes me laugh!

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so. The Kiva philosophy really speaks to me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small website company and I'm a graduate student working towards a degree in Information Technology.

lender.name: lefeedi
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to making a difference in the lives of those who need some assistance.

lender.name: Elliott
lender.loan_because: it keeps one from being owned by their money.
lender.occupational_info: I provide a mountaintop experience with God for children within a fun and loving community

lender.name: Alane
lender.loan_because: It allows me to show my gratitude for the abundance in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories and teach at a college.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: to spread God's love. and to promote peace through economic stability

lender.name: Prachi
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: OhGoddess
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with all I need and I want to help others become so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I promote water conservation, protection and preservation through community outreach and education programs.

lender.name: Katie
lender.occupation: Program Ass't, Mexico Institute, Wilson Center
lender.loan_because: I have a strong personal and professional commitment to the people of Latin America and want to support local efforts for development. In particular, I have seen the difference women's groups can make in a community and thus try to encourage dedicated individual women and women's co-ops in their efforts to promote development in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help organize conferences, produce publications, and bring together policymakers, scholars and business people to promote understanding and constructive dialogue in the United States' relationship with Mexico.

lender.name: Sanaz
lender.loan_because: I believe that a loan can create opportunities, provide hope and promote development in areas where such ideals are scarce.

lender.name: Teonna
lender.loan_because: I don't loan money i need money to help anmials and people.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-loans.
lender.occupational_info: A person who is trying to encourage international development.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Kiva offers me the chance to compound my giving. I can keep re-loaning my original contribution as it is repayed, helping many more people over time than a one-time donation.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies setup their accounting systems and help them get the information they need to run their businesses.

lender.name: Mitchell & Lu
lender.loan_because: 1) i care, 2) i can, and 3) the entrepreneurs inspire me!
lender.occupational_info: with the hope of sharing knowledge with the world

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: we are all beggars.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother of four small boys, and I sell cloth diapers out of my home.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: I lend because I can, and because I would want someone to lend me if I had a similar need.
lender.occupational_info: I design algorithms that learn from data and make the world more efficient.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: through Kiva, my dollars go directly to an individual, giving me feedback and awareness of how my contribution will help that person and their family. Once a loan is paid off, that money will be relent to help another. I can not get that from other charities.
lender.occupational_info: I work to secure computers and information technology in a system of college and universities.

lender.name: ebackMichele
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Jesue
lender.loan_because: It's a blessing and I feel like the circle of appreciation and hope is complete by doing so.
lender.occupational_info: My work is my passion. It's what I love to do (business and coaching) so I don't really see it as work. I see it as one of my reasons for being here.

lender.name: Steffen
lender.loan_because: I can help people building up their own business with just a little loan. Currently we starting a small business here in germany and we know how helpful a little loan could be.
lender.occupational_info: I working for a social communtiy here in germany as a software engineering. Currently i work for a team, which builds up new features for the community.

lender.name: Rima
lender.loan_because: I CARE
lender.occupational_info: FULL TIME MOM

lender.name: Niels
lender.loan_because: This way my small contribution can make a world of difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I communicate what some people do to make the world a better place to a broader audience.

lender.name: Winnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have a website which gives people information and resources to live in a way that benefits their own health and that of the planet as a whole.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because:
I'm fortunate enough to have the ability set some money aside for this and the multiplier effect, from both financial and social perspectives, is huge.
It's also way too cool that repayments of previous loans, from people all over the world, can fund a new loan for someone else all by themselves. I think it's just awesome that an initial downpayment of loans can set off a continuous cycle that allows people to grow their businesses, support their families and, in the meantime, enable someone else on the other end of the earth to do the same, just by paying the loan back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm getting a graduate degree in social entrepreneurship - learning how to use business skills and tools to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: makes me feel good
lender.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment industry as a producer

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I sell tile to people, and help them decide how to make their tile installations look nice.

lender.name: Chimes
lender.loan_because: We Care

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who can't help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people how to make a positive impact on the world around them.

lender.name: Eduardo
lender.loan_because: I believe in bottom up approaches to development

lender.name: fotodad
lender.loan_because: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness. Dalai Lama

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: Humans, as a species, have a moral responsibility to care for each other. I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: When I write technical information, it helps more people understand what is presented.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can help people all over the world, and I know exactly who is getting my money.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a doggy daycare and boarding facility. We take care of people's dogs while they are away. All of the dogs are in playgroups during the day and people bring their dogs to us to play for the day as well!.

lender.name: Edouard
lender.loan_because: I think that helping each other is one of the most human thing to do. If we don't help each other, nobody and nothing will... There is only sky above, so let's start to help each other and count on nothing else.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I understand how small loans can make a huge different in people's lives.

lender.name: Aldo
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I believe in giving others the opportunity to control their own fate via running their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am the co-founder, co-owner and Chief Creative Officer of a communications firm called Mind & Media, which helps federal government agencies (in the US) with public awareness campaigns, recruitment, retention and training.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy successful stories and by making a small contribution (lending) allows me an opprotunity to be part of that story.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and guide individuals and businesses to make financial decisions.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: its a good way of sharing the load
lender.occupational_info: engineering of steel and injection moulding of plastic

lender.name: Michel
lender.loan_because: I like to the idea of helping someone less fortunate than I am and I also like the fact the I will know WHO I'm helping.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an ERP systems support/programmer for a multinational paper company

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I had several kind people give me loans to start my business, and its nice to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Massage Therapy and Reiki - owner of a wellness center

lender.name: Kiva Friends Quilt Fund
lender.loan_because: This fund has been raised by KIVAFriends who have created a Quilt titled "Quilt of Dreams." This quilt is featured in the 2009 KIVA FRIENDS CALENDAR.
lender.occupational_info: This fund is managed by KIVAfriends and money raised from the quilt goes to help fund Projects Created by KIVAfriends. Please Join KIVAFriends.org and support our group projects!

lender.name: The Guang family
lender.loan_because: I would like to see hard working people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Me - FDA employee Husband - dentist Dog - full time cutie

lender.name: ann
lender.whereabouts: The Great Lakes State of Michigan
lender.loan_because: The people who borrow this money enrich their own lives and in the process they make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: sell specialized items and teach water classes in a pool

lender.name: Mie Kobayashi
lender.loan_because: One of happiness in my life might be shared for someone else's happiness.

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: I lend because I know that an amount of money that is a very small sacrifice for me will turn into an enormous improvement in someone else's life. I also lend because, unlike my charitable donations, this form of help is reusable!
lender.occupational_info: I help people who don't like computers figure out what they want a computer system to do for them. Then I help a very technical programmer understand what the non-technical person is looking for. I also manage a team of people who do this kind of work. I'm new to managing, so it is an exciting challenge for me.

lender.name: Synergy Bates ISB
lender.loan_because: I am a teacher with Middle School Students at the International School of Bangkok. The money we use to lend, has been raised by the students in their own time.

lender.name: Jared
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the chance to be an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: English Teacher

lender.name: maulana
lender.loan_because: Expanded my efforts
lender.occupational_info: My name ikhsan, my efforts were involved in the typing service, the improvement of the computer and the sale of the implement computer part . I really expected help of the loan to expand my efforts and I will return my loan $7 per week

lender.name: Carley
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to be part of something that empowers others and enables people to change their lives.

lender.name: Nabeelah
lender.loan_because: im looking to invest in aspiring artists
lender.occupational_info: its great being a student what we do is not necessarily "work" ;)

lender.name: Audra
lender.occupational_info: I help build webpages for the internet that help people who are sick recieve information on medical care.

lender.name: Leroy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me to be a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I create sustainable communities.

lender.name: Dolina
lender.loan_because: after traveling in developing nations for a year I understand how critical micro loans are to end poverty.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a health care attorney in the United States.

lender.name: YVHS Art
lender.loan_because: We want to brighten everyones future...
lender.occupational_info: We are High School Art & Ceramics Students

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: It is vital for the next generation to learn that making a difference in one persons world really can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Raising a family and always learning.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with federal offenders who need a second chance after prison. I also pastor at an inner city church in Windsor Ontario. And I love to farm. I have a community supported agriculture farm that I run.

lender.name: Inge
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Ace
lender.loan_because: This truly sounds like a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a magician and a writer. I do magic tricks to entertain people and I've written a book about a magician.

lender.name: Syed Kamall
lender.loan_because: I believe the most effective way to tackle global poverty is to help entrepreneurs who will create wealth and jobs for their fellow citizens.
lender.occupational_info: A politician who believes that increasing trade and encouraging entrepreneurs is an effective way to tackle global poverty.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: "Be the change, you wish to see in the world." -Ghandi

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I write about gardening for a magazine.

lender.name: Luisa
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help people who are less fortunate than I am. I want to know that I can help people around the world even if it's a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed because of the economy but I'm hopeful that I'll find something. Until then, I'm hoping to be able to find a good volunteer organization to join so that I can lend a hand to others.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: It's part of the solution to global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I connect workforce development initiatives with sustainable, affordable housing and clean energy production projects.

lender.name: Lainee
lender.loan_because: I want to help people gain impowerment and independence through their entrepreneurships. I respect the hard work that goes into building a bussiness.

lender.name: Sylvain
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their life
lender.occupational_info: I'm a director in a global IT consulting firm.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: As a single mother with two daughters and a grand daughter I feel very grateful for the abundant life I live in Canada. It is an honor to lend a hand to people around the world who are brave enough to ask.
lender.occupational_info: I do computer presentations, posters, charts, and other graphics for a large company in Calgary.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I am compelled by God. He that give to the poor lends to the Lord. I want to be concerned about my brothers, and sisters of every nation and to show my gratitude to the Lord God for His many blessings, by giving to others some of the blessings that He has given to me.

lender.name: Kristin Alise
lender.loan_because: I want to do what I can do to make the world a better place.(?)
lender.occupational_info: I try to: sometimes cure, often ease and always comfort. (Difficult to translate..)

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in the many different cultures of the world throughout time - what makes us different and the same.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because:
The Lord says in Isaiah 58:
"Is not this the fast that I choose: to loose the bonds of injustice, to undo the thongs of the yoke, to let the oppressed go free, and to break every yoke? 7Is it not to share your bread with the hungry, and bring the homeless poor into your house; when you see the naked, to cover them, and not to hide yourself from your own kin? 8Then your light shall break forth like the dawn, and your healing shall spring up quickly; your vindicator* shall go before you, the glory of the Lord shall be your rearguard. 9Then you shall call, and the Lord will answer; you shall cry for help, and he will say, Here I am. "
lender.occupational_info: I work with college students for a campus ministry called InterVarsity Christian Fellowship. Our purpose is to see lives transformed, campuses renewed, and world changers developed. I develop leaders to love God's word and become a part of a multi-ethnic witnessing community. I'm an intern so I also have a desk job to pay the bills in the meantime. (=

lender.name: Sarah & Israel
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to have the little that God has given us and we will want others to have equal or same opportunity no-mather where they are. We want to help change lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I (Israel) am an Accountant and a part-time graduate student. I oversees the day-to-day financial activities of a business.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to reach out beyond myself and help someone else. I also think it's a pretty amazing way to see determination in action. I am a single parent without a lot to give monetarily, so Kiva helps enable me to do something.
